DOC.brief_title: Stimulated Intrauterine Insemination Cycles Unstimulated Intrauterine Insemination Cycles Couples With Unexplained Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: Unexplained infertility common diagnosis encounter subfertility clinic ; 15-30 % infertile couple diagnose unexplained infertility . Couples usually diagnose unexplained infertility woman ovulatory cycle , patent tube spouse normal semen analysis accord world health organisation criterion . In absence organic abnormality clear functional defect , couple unexplained infertility subject several empirical treatment include intra-uterine insemination ( IUI ) . The application ovarian stimulation IUI advocate , even woman ovulatory cycle , improve pregnancy rate IUI . However , application ovarian stimulation two main drawback : The increased chance multiple pregnancy ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome . To avoid complication unstimulated IUI cycle investigate . The objective study evaluate role stimulate unstimulated IUI cycle management unexplained infertility . The study conduct Cairo university hospital BeniSuef University hospital All patient unexplained infertility attend site invite participate study . The study explain couple sign write consent include study . Four hundred fifty woman unexplained infertility divide 3 equal group use computer generate random number : Group 1 4 stimulate IUI cycle , group 2 4 unstimulated cycle , woman become pregnant 4 cycle group 1 2 advise regular intercourse expect time ovulation . Group 3 control group advise regular sexual intercourse time ovulation 6 month On 3rd day menstruation group 1 vaginal ultrasound receive daily intramuscular 150 IU human menopausal gonadotropin ( hMG , Merional ® , IBSA , Lugano , Switzerland ) start 3nd day menstruation . On day 8 ultrasound repeat serum E2 measure , hMG dose adjust continued frequency ultrasound scan individualize . HMG stop least 2 follicle measure 18 mm associate serum E2 500-3000 Pg/mL , follow administration 10000 IU human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ; Choriomon® , IBSA ) Women group 2 ask test morning urine specimen luteinizing hormone daily start 4 day expect day ovulation . This do use qualitative kit . Intrauterine insemination perform day surge urinary excretion luteinizing hormone . Women group 3 ask test urine luteinizing hormone method group 2 . They ask intercourse day surge urinary excretion luteinizing hormone repeat 12 month . Semen specimens group 1 2 evaluate prepared IUI within one hour collection . Semen dilute 1:2 ( vol/vol ) HEPES-buffered Ham 's F10 medium contain 1.5 percent serum albumin . After centrifugation 10 minute , pellet resuspend combined 3 ml medium . The sperm suspension centrifuge 10 minute , pellet resuspend 0.35 ml medium . Approximately 0.05 ml use determine concentration motility sperm . The remain sample drawn shepherd catheter attach 1 mL syringe inject uterus . The procedure repeat 4 month group 1 2 , pregnancy occur . Women conceive 4 trial ask check urine luteinizing hormone use ovulation detection kit intercourse day follow luteinizing hormone surge . This repeat 8 month . The pregnancy rate 3 group compare 4 month one year .
